instructions: Go to the Home screen , then open the app. To return to the call, tap the green bar at the top of the screen.

While on a call, tap Add Call, make another call, then Tap Merge Calls. Repeat to add more people to the conference. During the conference call, do any of the following: Talk privately with one person: Tap the More Info button , then tap Private next to the person. Tap Merge Calls to resume the conference. Add an incoming caller on the same line: Tap Hold Call + Answer, then tap Merge Calls. Drop one person: Tap the More Info button next to a person, then tap End.

On Android, tap the three-dotted menu button at the top right of the Firefox app, and then tap Settings . On iOS, tap the three-lined hamburger menu at the bottom right, and then Settings . Select Clear private data on Android, or Data Management on iOS. Select Cache and any other items you want to clear. Choose CLEAR DATA on Android. For iOS, select Clear Private Data and then OK .
